title: 88/307/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 May 1988 on the eligibility of expenditure for the development of monitoring and supervision facilities necessary for applying the Community arrangements for the conservation of fishery resources (Only the Spanish, Danish, English, French, Dutch and Portuguese texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 May 1988
on the eligibility of expenditure for the development of monitoring and supervision facilities necessary for applying the Community arrangements for the conservation of fishery resources
(Only the Danish, French, English, Dutch, Portuguese and Spanish texts are authentic)
(88/307/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The expenditure shown in the Annex, in an amount of 11 013 047 ECU, is eligible for a financial contribution under Decision 87/278/EEC.

This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark, the Kingdom of Spain, the French Republic, Ireland, the Kingdom of the Netherlands, the Portuguese Republic and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 May 1988.
For the Commission
Antonio CARDOSO E CUNHA
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 135, 23. 5. 1987, p. 31.
